statements: SELECT * FROM collaboration_history;
SELECT id, user_id, change_description FROM collaboration_history;
SELECT user_id, change_description FROM collaboration_history ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, change_description FROM collaboration_history WHERE change_description LIKE '%update%';
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id FROM collaboration_history WHERE change_description LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT change_timestamp, change_description FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 2 AND change_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, change_description, change_timestamp FROM collaboration_history WHERE change_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT change_description FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY user_id, change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, COUNT(*) FROM collaboration_history GROUP BY action HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM collaboration_history WHERE action = 'edit' AND timestamp > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM collaboration_history ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, event_description FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM collaboration_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_events > 2;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM collaboration_history WHERE event_type LIKE 'meeting%' ORDER BY event_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT board_id, board_name FROM whiteboard_history WHERE user_id = 3 AND creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2020-01-01' AND join_date <= '2020-12-31';
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM collaboration_history CH JOIN users U ON CH.user_id = U.user_id WHERE U.username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT whiteboard_id, whiteboard_name, created_date FROM whiteboard WHERE created_by = 1;
SELECT * FROM changes WHERE change_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, action_description FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT whiteboard_id, whiteboard_name, created_by, created_date FROM whiteboard ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT history_id, user_id, action_time, action_description FROM collaboration_history WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT change_id, whiteboard_id, user_id, change_description, change_time FROM changes ORDER BY change_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM collaboration_events WHERE event_type = 'meeting';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM collaboration_events WHERE event_type = 'comment';
SELECT user_id, details -> 'action' FROM collaboration_events WHERE event_type = 'action';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT whiteboard_name, date_created FROM whiteboards WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM collaboration_events
SELECT event_id, event_type, user_id, timestamp FROM collaboration_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT u.user_id, username, email, date_joined, action_type FROM users u JOIN user_actions a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE action_type = 'login'
SELECT whiteboard_name, date_created FROM whiteboards WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_created ASC

SELECT c.change_id, w.whiteboard_name, u.username, c.timestamp, c.change_details FROM whiteboard_changes c JOIN whiteboards w ON c.whiteboard_id = w.whiteboard_id JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY c.timestamp DESC
